approvals.surveyTemplate:

                  How are you preventing the risks

What are the possible risks?
Bad people could break stuff.

How are you preventing the risks
We are assuming all people are nice.

comments.content: Please don't make such dangerous assumptions.
Please have more faith in humanity.
